title: Inception
overview: A thief with the ability to enter people's dreams takes on one last heist.

title: The Dark Knight
overview: Batman sets out to dismantle the remaining criminal organizations in Gotham.

title: Interstellar
overview: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to save humanity.

title: Parasite
overview: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy household.

title: The Matrix
overview: A hacker discovers the shocking truth about his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Avengers: Endgame
overview: The Avengers assemble once more to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

title: The Godfather
overview: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his empire to his reluctant son.

title: Pulp Fiction
overview: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine.

title: Fight Club
overview: An insomniac office worker and a soap maker form an underground fight club.

title: Forrest Gump
overview: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, and more through the eyes of an Alabama man.
